name: RF3
description: RF3 is a made-for-VR game where players can form 3 different weapons to blast reality as it forms in front of them.   Built and tested on Oculus Rift & Touch, but should work on Vive as well.   Use your neutralizer to destroy reality constructor drones, use your time shifter to slow them down, and user your dematerializer to remove pieces of reality that have been installed.
